title: MPL
subtitle: SDE Intern
details: • Founding member of the engineering team, played a pivotal role in creating a cutting-edge product from 0 to 1, leading microservice architectural development, fine-tuning language models, and end-to-end backend implementation.
• Used Node.js and Java to develop a microservices architecture, while using Kafka to transport messages between services asynchronously
• Implemented WebSocket and gRPC for rapid client and service communication, enhancing overall system efficiency.

title: Barclays
subtitle: Summer Intern
details: • Initiated requirements definition and led Figma UI/UX design for a user-friendly ”Application 360 View” interface.
• Implemented the frontend using React and React-Redux for efficient state management and user-specific data delivery
• Developed Node.js backend, simulating real data for two internal services, leveraging MongoDB for data management.

title: Fleek
subtitle: Backend Developer Intern
details: • Implemented a new transaction history feature for the wallet and digital currency, Fleek Coins, showcasing refunds, purchases, cashbacks, and referrals. The feature significantly improved transparency and usability for customers
• Developed and integrated 20 unit tested APIs with new subscription model for streamlined data management.
• Automated data migration with celery task queue, ensuring timely, accurate updates to the newly migrated table.

title: Pune Institute of Computer Technology
subtitle: Research Intern
details: • Created a reliable backup system for files to organize unstructured data from several sources.
• A Version control is maintained while retaining performance and scalability by allowing many users to start the backup and access any prior versions of a file.

title: Bipolar Factory
subtitle: Full Stack Developer Intern
details: • Worked with MQTT standard messaging protocol for IoT and Developed live hardware status sharing web application and mobile application backend.
• Designed and created the backend of Uttar Pradesh election polling booth mobile application.

title: KodeIT
subtitle: Full Stack Developer Intern
details: • Handling backend and frontend development of the websites and applications using MERN Stack.
